name: Super Iggy Bros
description:
hobby project that was worked on for months

smash clone with some characters from my games play 1v1 against your friends (local play).

-4 maps

-5 playable characters

 campaign with 4  short levels (1-3 min) - few enemy variants, you gain score for how well you do the levels. a cool boss level at level 5.

controller support.

feedback is welcomed
